title: Domino’s Stock Slides After Slower Sales Growth Warning
text:
Domino’s Pizza stock is falling on Tuesday, following the restaurant chain’s third-quarter earnings report, which came in softer than expected and included a less robust outlook.

The back story. While plenty of fast-food restaurants have thrived in 2019, Domino’s (ticker: DPZ) isn’t one of them. Shares have fallen more than 2% year to date, compared with the S&P 500’s 17% rise. description: After a third-quarter earnings report that was softer than expected, the pizza chain issued new sales growth targets for the next two to three years.
